name: Team Ymanie the Magnificent: Aqua Adventure
name_original: Team Ymanie the Magnificent: Aqua Adventure
description:
Note: the games resolution is on purpose to give it a retro vibe

Welcome to 

Join to survey the Mariana Trench with our latest submarine, the SS Ymanie. It's only a survey mission but things can go wrong so watch out for all the different types of creatures down there and if necessary, use the frontal cannon to blast your way out of danger.

Controls:

Barrel Roll: A or D depending on which direction you'd like to roll

Dodge: Space Bar

Shoot: Left Mouse Click to shoot wherever the target is pointing

Good luck down there Explorers.

Credits 

Programmer: Amy

Artists (3D/2D): Hayley, Tessa, Denisa, Abby, Hannah, Scarlett

Leaders: Tessa, Denisa
